qa_candidates.question: What are the mailbox limits and pricing for adding extra mailboxes to my business plan?
qa_candidates.answer: For business plan users, there is a fair usage policy with a maximum of 1,000 mailboxes included. If you need to connect more mailboxes, you can add extra slots at a cost of $50 per month for each additional 1,000 mailboxes. For larger expansions, such as 2,000 extra mailboxes, the cost would be $100 per month. The pricing is linear, and the support team can arrange the expansion and update your billing using the payment method on file.

qa_candidates.question: How should I ramp up sending emails from newly warmed Google accounts to ensure good deliverability?
qa_candidates.answer: When starting to send emails from newly warmed Google accounts, it's best to begin with a very low volume, such as 1-3 emails per day for the first week. After a week, you can gradually increase the sending volume to 5-8 emails per day per account. It's also recommended to keep the warmup process running at around 10 warmup emails per day, and consider randomizing the warmup volume for more natural activity. After the initial week, you can enable automatic ramp-up in your inbox settings to safely increase your sending volume.

qa_candidates.question: How can I set up fallback values for variables in my email campaigns if a variable is missing?
qa_candidates.answer: You can set up fallback values for variables using our spintax feature. If a variable is not present, you can define a default replacement (fallback) value in your email template. For detailed instructions and examples, please refer to our spintax guide: https://help.plusvibe.ai/en/articles/8606174-spintax-guide.

qa_candidates.answer: You can view your contact or lead limits and current usage by clicking your profile icon in the top right corner of your account dashboard. This section will display your current limits and how many contacts you have used.

qa_candidates.question: How can I set or reset a password if I signed up using Google login and don't have an existing password?
qa_candidates.answer: If you signed up using Google login and do not have an existing password, you can set a password by using the 'Forgot Password' function on the login page. Enter your email address associated with your Google account, and you will receive a password reset email. Follow the instructions in the email to set a new password for your account.

qa_candidates.question: How can I bulk assign email accounts to a campaign instead of selecting them one by one?
qa_candidates.answer: You can create a tag and assign inboxes to that tag first. Then you can use that tag to add or remove all associated inboxes to the campaign. Tags are created and managed in workspace settings under Tag Manager.

qa_candidates.question: If I change the 'Send to Risky' setting after some leads have already been skipped, how can I resend emails to those skipped leads?
qa_candidates.answer: If leads have already been skipped due to the previous 'Send to Risky' setting, they will not be re-contacted automatically. To resend emails to those skipped leads, you can either move them to a new duplicate campaign and send again, or delete and re-upload them to the same campaign. Both methods will allow you to re-engage those leads under the new setting.

qa_candidates.question: Why can't I see my email signature in my campaign sequence, and how can I fix SMTP errors to send emails?
qa_candidates.answer: If you can't see your email signature in your campaign sequence, make sure you have added the {{sender_signature}} variable to the body of your email template. Additionally, ensure that you have connected an email account to your campaign, as the signature is fetched from the connected account. If you are experiencing an SMTP error, such as 'please enable SMTP on your Microsoft account,' you will need to have your IT department enable SMTP for your account. Once SMTP is enabled and the email account is properly connected, you should be able to launch your campaign and send emails.

qa_candidates.question: What is the difference in email warmup features between the personal and business plans?
qa_candidates.answer: The business plan offers advanced warmup features, including the ability to tie generated email chains to a specific industry, use a warmup schedule that matches your typical sending window, skip weekends, set reply rates for emails, and warm up your custom tracking domain and email signatures. These features are not available on the personal plan.

qa_candidates.answer: Warmup emails should be automatically placed in the pipl.ai folder. Make sure that email forwarding is set up correctly, as this can affect filtering.

qa_candidates.question: How does the blacklist feature work? If a domain or email is added to the blacklist, will emails still be sent to them in future campaigns?
qa_candidates.answer: Once an email address or domain is added to the blacklist, no emails will be sent to them again, even if they are included in future campaigns. The system automatically skips sending to blacklisted addresses, so you do not need to remove them manually from your lists.

qa_candidates.question: How do I add multiple Gmail or Google Workspace email accounts from the same domain to Plusvibe (formerly pipl.ai)?
qa_candidates.answer: To add multiple Gmail or Google Workspace email accounts from the same domain to Plusvibe, first complete the app connection (OAuth) for your domain in Google Workspace, granting the necessary permissions. After this, you need to connect each individual email account separately within Plusvibe by clicking the 'Add new account' button and logging in to each unique Gmail account you want to add. Make sure to log out of any previous Gmail sessions before connecting a new account to avoid login loops. Repeat this process for each user email you wish to connect under the same domain.

qa_candidates.question: If I import a list of leads that includes contacts already imported into an active campaign, will the system create duplicate leads?
qa_candidates.answer: No, the system will not create duplicate leads within a single campaign. If you import a list that contains leads already present in the campaign (for example, leads with the same email address), those duplicates will be automatically skipped and not imported again.

qa_candidates.question: Where can I adjust the email delivery interval settings for my campaign?
qa_candidates.answer: The delivery interval settings are configured for each inbox individually, not at the campaign or general settings level. To change how frequently emails are sent, go to the settings for each inbox associated with your campaign and adjust the delivery interval there.

qa_candidates.question: Can I set the maximum emails per day to 0 so that my campaign uses my email account's sending limit?
qa_candidates.answer: No, setting the maximum emails per day to 0 means that your campaign will not send any emails at all. It does not default to your email account's sending limit. To control sending volume, set the maximum to the desired number of emails per day.

qa_candidates.question: What is the correct process for verifying and enriching leads when creating campaigns to ensure results are available in the campaign?
qa_candidates.answer: To ensure that verification and enrichment results are available in your campaign, you should first verify and enrich your leads in the list. Wait until the verification process is fully completed in the list before importing those leads into your campaign. Once the verification is finished and you push the leads to the campaign, the verification and enrichment results will be included. If you verify leads after they have already been added to a campaign, the results may not sync automatically. Always allow the verification to finish in the list before moving leads to a campaign.

qa_candidates.question: Is it possible to link a single email account to multiple workspaces after adding it to one workspace?
qa_candidates.answer: No, a single email account can only be used for one workspace. It is not possible to link the same email account to multiple workspaces after it has been added.

qa_candidates.question: Do I need to add anything specific to my SPF record for your cold email service, or is the standard SPF record sufficient?
qa_candidates.answer: You do not need to include anything specific to our tool in your SPF record. Our service uses your existing email infrastructure and mail server to send emails, so your standard SPF records are sufficient.

qa_candidates.question: How does A/B testing work on Pipl, and can I split the test by a specific percentage or automatically send the winning variation to the remaining recipients?
qa_candidates.answer: On Pipl, A/B testing evenly splits the sending volume between your variations once the campaign starts. You can monitor the performance of each variation in the campaign statistics and manually enable or disable variations as needed. There is currently no option to automatically split by a custom percentage or automatically send the winning variation to the remaining recipients. You can access the A/B testing functionality through the sequence editor.

qa_candidates.question: How can I create and use my own reply templates in the AI Replier?
qa_candidates.answer: To create your own reply templates in the AI Replier, use the 'Save as reply snippet' option, which is located at the bottom right of the interface. Once you've written a reply you'd like to reuse, click 'Save as reply snippet' to store it. You can then select these saved snippets when making replies in the future. Note that the term 'snippet' is used instead of 'template' in the interface.

qa_candidates.question: Why does a lead show as 'Skipped: No MX record found for lead' during email validation?
qa_candidates.answer: A lead is marked as 'Skipped: No MX record found for lead' because the email address does not have a valid MX (Mail Exchange) record. This means the domain is not configured to receive emails, so the system cannot validate or send emails to that address.

qa_candidates.question: Will deleting a lead list affect my running email campaigns?
qa_candidates.answer: No, deleting a lead list will not cause any issues to your running campaigns. However, if you delete leads directly from a campaign, you won't be able to detect replies, stats, or other related information for those leads.

qa_candidates.question: What happens to my connected email accounts in Pipl.ai if I cancel my subscription? Will they be deleted or just become inactive?
qa_candidates.answer: If you cancel your Pipl.ai subscription, your connected email accounts will become inactive but will not be deleted from the system. As long as the credentials for those accounts are not changed, you can reactivate them by resubscribing to a plan in the future without needing to reconnect them. However, you will still need to continue paying your email infrastructure provider to maintain access to those accounts.

qa_candidates.question: Why is my email formatting, such as bold text, not appearing in test emails sent from my campaign?
qa_candidates.answer: If your email formatting, like bold text, is not appearing in your test emails, it's likely because you have enabled plain text sending. Plain text emails do not support formatting such as bold, italics, or colors. To include formatting in your emails, you should disable plain text sending and use HTML or rich text mode instead.

qa_candidates.question: What is the recommended practice for pausing cold email sending to improve email reputation, and how long should I pause sending to help recover from spam issues?
qa_candidates.answer: It is a standard practice to occasionally pause all cold email sending and allow your email accounts to focus solely on warming up. This helps recover and preserve your domain and sender reputation, especially if you suspect issues with spam placement. A recommended pause duration is 14 days, but extending it up to 30 days can further help with reputation and longevity. During this period, keep your accounts in the warmup process without sending cold emails.

qa_candidates.question: Does your system automatically randomize email sending times, or do I need to set them manually?
qa_candidates.answer: Our system has built-in AI logic that automatically randomizes and determines the best time to send emails. You do not need to manually set the sending time, even if you select a specific interval like 5 minutes.

qa_candidates.question: If I leave the subject field empty when adding a follow-up step, will the same subject line be used as the previous email?
qa_candidates.answer: Yes, if you leave the subject field empty for a follow-up step, the same subject line as the previous email will be used. This ensures that your emails are grouped together as a conversation in the recipient's inbox.

qa_candidates.answer: Yes, you can adjust or add custom fields to leads in a campaign even after it has started. This will update the existing leads with the new or modified custom fields.

qa_candidates.question: How accurate are warmup tools like 'Warmup Saved from Spam' for measuring email deliverability and spam rates?
qa_candidates.answer: Warmup tools like 'Warmup Saved from Spam' provide a good indication of your email account's health. A warmup score above 90% generally means there are no major issues with your infrastructure setup, and your domain or IP is not blacklisted. However, these tools do not guarantee the same deliverability for your actual campaign emails. This is because warmup emails are exchanged within a controlled pool and often use unique content, while campaign emails are typically sent in bulk with similar content, which can trigger spam filters. Therefore, while warmup metrics are useful for monitoring technical health, they may not fully reflect real-world deliverability for your campaigns.
similar_questions: Why do email warmup tools like Pipl show better inbox placement results compared to online spam checkers, and does this mean my real campaign emails will avoid spam folders?

qa_candidates.question: If I receive bonus enrichment credits from a promotion or review, will my total credits reset to the standard monthly amount or will the bonus credits carry over to the next month?
qa_candidates.answer: Bonus enrichment credits, such as those received from promotions or reviews, will not carry over to the next month. Your credits will reset to your standard monthly amount at the start of each billing cycle. However, if you are unable to use your bonus credits before the billing date, you can request an exception to have them re-credited for the next month.

qa_candidates.question: If I schedule follow-up emails with a waiting period and my campaign does not send emails on weekends, will the follow-up emails be sent in the correct order based on when the initial emails were sent, assuming the sending account is available?
qa_candidates.answer: Yes, if your sending account is available and has not reached its daily sending limit, the follow-up emails (e.g., Email 2) will be sent in the order they were triggered. This means that follow-ups triggered by earlier initial emails (e.g., Thursday) will be sent before those triggered by later initial emails (e.g., Friday), even if both are scheduled to go out on the same day after a weekend.

qa_candidates.question: If my email server or hosting changes but my inbox usernames stay the same, will I be able to continue previous email conversations in my email platform, and do I need to rewarm my inboxes after the server change?
qa_candidates.answer: If your email server or hosting changes but your inbox usernames remain the same, you should still be able to continue previous conversations in your email platform, as long as you use the same inbox to send replies. The platform will treat replies from the same username as part of the ongoing conversation, even if the original emails are not present in the mailbox. Additionally, after a server change, it is generally not necessary to rewarm your inboxes if you are using the same email addresses, but you should monitor deliverability and consult your provider if you notice any issues.

qa_candidates.answer: Unfortunately, it is not possible to retroactively import or resync previously missed emails into the Pipl unibox inbox. qa_candidates.question: Can I use a Google Workspace group email address as the sender for campaigns in Pipl.ai?
qa_candidates.answer: No, you cannot use a Google Workspace group email address (which functions as an alias with multiple members) as the sender for campaigns in Pipl.ai. This ensures that the leads are properly mapped and associated between Pipl and Hubspot at the time of import.

qa_candidates.question: Can I use Pipl webhooks to detect test emails or simulate webhook events without sending live campaigns?
qa_candidates.answer: No, Pipl webhooks are not designed to detect test emails or simulate webhook events. To test your webhook integration, you will need to create and send a live campaign. There is currently no built-in way to simulate or trigger webhook events without using live data.

qa_candidates.question: Does Pipl.ai automatically randomize spintax variations between emails, or do I need to manually change the spintax order in my sequences?
qa_candidates.answer: Pipl.ai automatically randomizes every spintax variation for each step in your email sequences. You do not need to manually change the spintax order yourself; the system ensures that different variations are used across emails to help determine which perform best.

qa_candidates.question: Can I add attachments to my email replies?
qa_candidates.answer: Yes, you can add attachments to your email replies. There is a button in the reply interface that allows you to attach files.
similar_questions: How can I insert an image into my email if the original image URL does not allow embedding?

qa_candidates.question: What information should I include in my CSV file when uploading contacts, and are there any formatting requirements?
qa_candidates.answer: You can include any fields you like in your CSV file, such as emails and names. The main formatting requirement is that you should not have a period (.) at the end of any field name.
similar_questions: Do line breaks in CSV files get imported correctly when uploading lead lists?

qa_candidates.question: What is the purpose of the OpenAI API key settings, and what features require it?
qa_candidates.answer: The OpenAI API key settings allow you to use your own OpenAI API key for the AI enrichment workflow, such as enriching lists of leads. If you use your own key, you won't be charged enrichment credits. However, other AI-related features like campaign content generation, auto spintax, and the AI reply agent are included in your subscription and do not require you to provide an OpenAI API key.
qa_candidates.topic: AI features and OpenAI API integration

qa_candidates.question: Can I personalize the preview text (the first line recipients see next to the subject) in emails sent through Plusvibe?
qa_candidates.answer: Currently, Plusvibe does not allow direct customization of the preview text (the first line shown next to the subject in recipients' inboxes). This text is typically generated from the beginning of your email body. While some users may attempt to modify it using HTML, there is no built-in feature for easy customization at this time. We appreciate your feedback and will consider this feature for future updates.

qa_candidates.question: Will my email campaigns and warmup processes continue to run if I shut down my computer, since your platform is cloud-based?
qa_candidates.answer: Yes, our platform is cloud-based, so your email campaigns and warmup processes will continue to run even if you shut down your computer. The system operates independently of your local hardware, so you don't need to keep your device on for scheduled tasks to be completed.

qa_candidates.question: Why are there no events available in Zapier when connecting Plusvibe (or Pipl), and how can I set up a trigger?
qa_candidates.answer: When connecting Plusvibe or Pipl to Zapier, you may not see any events available because these services do not provide native event triggers in Zapier. Instead, you should set up a webhook trigger in Zapier. To do this, create a webhook inside your Pipl (or Plusvibe) account that sends data to a Zapier Webhooks URL. Then, use the 'Webhooks by Zapier' trigger in your Zap to receive and process the data. This approach allows you to automate workflows even if the app does not have built-in Zapier triggers.

qa_candidates.question: How is your inbox service different from other premium inbox providers, and does it offer the same deliverability as setting up Google Workspace independently?
qa_candidates.answer: Our inbox service differs from many premium inbox providers primarily in infrastructure isolation. Each client receives their own dedicated Google Workspace admin panel, ensuring that your sending setup is completely isolated from others. This means that no other user's behavior can affect your deliverability. In contrast, some providers group many clients under a single admin panel, which can pose risks to deliverability in the long term. With our service, you own the domain, inbox, and setup, and we handle all technical configurations (such as SPF, DKIM, DMARC, warm-up, and DNS) to optimize your cold email performance.

qa_candidates.question: How can I include an automatic unsubscribe link in my email campaigns, and why doesn't it appear in the email preview or merge fields dropdown?
qa_candidates.answer: To include an automatic unsubscribe link in your email campaigns, enable the unsubscribe option in your campaign's safety settings. Once this option is turned on, the unsubscribe link will be automatically added to each email sent with the campaign. Note that the unsubscribe link may not appear in the merge fields dropdown or in the email draft preview, as it is only inserted when the emails are actually sent to recipients.

qa_candidates.question: How can I ensure that variables like company names are displayed in lowercase when sending emails through Plusvibe?
qa_candidates.answer: There are two ways to ensure variables such as company names appear in lowercase in your Plusvibe campaigns. First, you can use Excel to convert the data to lowercase before importing it into Plusvibe by applying a formula like =LOWER(A2) to your data. Second, you can use Plusvibe's AI workflow feature to automatically convert company names to lowercase format within the platform.

qa_candidates.question: If I have multiple senders in a campaign, will each lead only receive emails from one sender, or can they receive emails from multiple senders?
qa_candidates.answer: Each lead in a campaign will only be contacted by one sender for the duration of the campaign. Once a lead is assigned to a sender, all emails to that lead will come from the same sender, ensuring consistency in communication.

qa_candidates.question: How can I prevent unwanted quotation marks or symbols from appearing in AI-generated email content?
qa_candidates.answer: If you notice unwanted quotation marks or symbols in AI-generated emails, you can adjust your prompt to instruct the AI not to include them. Be specific in your instructions when crafting the prompt, as the AI typically follows explicit directions. For example, you can add a note like 'Do not include quotation marks or extra symbols in the output.' This should help reduce or eliminate the unwanted characters.

qa_candidates.question: If I forward an email before responding, will the recipient see the forwarded email when I reply?
qa_candidates.answer: No, if you use Unibox, any forwarded email will not be included in your reply. You can safely respond to the lead without them seeing the forwarded email.

qa_candidates.question: Is calendar integration for the reply agent planned?
qa_candidates.answer: Yes, calendar integration for the reply agent is something that is being considered for future development. In the meantime, you can include your calendar link in your reply content as a workaround.

qa_candidates.question: Does the 'Stop Sending to Same Domain on Reply' feature apply to public domains like Gmail?
qa_candidates.answer: No, the 'Stop Sending to Same Domain on Reply' feature does not apply to public domains such as Gmail or Mweb. It only applies to private or custom domains.

qa_candidates.question: How can I enable two-factor authentication on my account?
qa_candidates.answer: Currently, we do not support two-factor authentication for accounts.

qa_candidates.question: How can I change the profile picture for the email accounts I use with your DFY email service?
qa_candidates.answer: To change the profile picture for your email accounts, you need to log in to each email account and update the profile picture through your email service provider's account settings. For example, if you are using Google accounts, you can go to https://myaccount.google.com/personal-info to update your profile picture. If you received these inboxes through our DFY service and do not know the password, please refer to the credentials provided to you during setup.

qa_candidates.question: Can I pay with my PayPal account?
qa_candidates.answer: Sorry, we only support payments through Stripe at this time.

qa_candidates.question: Is it possible to CC email addresses in subsequence emails within a campaign?
qa_candidates.answer: Currently, CC functionality for subsequence emails is not available, but we recognize its usefulness—especially for clients who want follow-up emails visible in their main inbox or CRM. We are considering this feature and plan to implement CC for subsequence emails in the future.

qa_candidates.question: Does your platform plan to develop a pipeline view or additional CRM features, or will integration with external CRMs remain the primary solution?
qa_candidates.answer: We do not currently have plans to develop CRM features such as a pipeline view. However, we may integrate with more external CRMs in the future, such as GoHighLevel. For now, using integrations with platforms like HubSpot is the recommended solution.

qa_candidates.question: Why can't I register on the pipl.com website? Do you know the reason?
qa_candidates.answer: Pipl.ai and Pipl.com are completely separate companies and are not related to each other, aside from having similar names. Therefore, Pipl.ai does not have information about issues with registering on pipl.com.

qa_candidates.question: Can I set up a multi-step cold outreach sequence that targets multiple contacts at a company in a specific order using your platform?
qa_candidates.answer: Currently, our platform does not support sequential outreach logic where you contact a general address first and then follow up with individual decision makers if there is no response. Most of our clients add all relevant contacts from a company to a campaign and reach out to them simultaneously, rather than in a specific order.

qa_candidates.question: Is it possible to enrich a Facebook profile using information from a LinkedIn profile?
qa_candidates.answer: No, it is not possible to enrich a Facebook profile with information from a LinkedIn profile at this time.

qa_candidates.question: How do I use the page_trail parameter to paginate through results when listing email accounts with the Pipl API?
qa_candidates.answer: When you use the /api/v1/account/list endpoint in the Pipl API, the response may include a page_trail value if there are more results than can fit in a single response (the maximum per page is 100 accounts). To retrieve additional results, copy the page_trail value from the response and make the same API call again, appending ?page_trail=that_value to the endpoint URL. Repeat this process with each new page_trail value you receive until there are no more results.

qa_candidates.question: How is the reply rate calculated? Are bounced leads included in the calculation?
qa_candidates.answer: Bounced leads are not included when calculating the reply rate. The reply rate is based on the number of replies divided by the number of emails that were actually delivered. Additionally, auto-replies such as out-of-office messages or system-generated responses are not counted in the reply rate statistics.

qa_candidates.question: If I upgrade my Pipl.ai plan from Personal to Business, will I only be charged the difference between the two plans, and will my renewal date stay the same?
qa_candidates.answer: Yes, when you upgrade your Pipl.ai plan from Personal to Business, you will typically be charged only the difference between the two plans, and your renewal date will remain the same. This is the default logic when upgrading your plan.

qa_candidates.question: What is the reply rate for basic warm-up, and can using the same warm-up filter tag hurt deliverability?
qa_candidates.answer: The reply rate for basic warm-up is 35%. It's preferable not to use the same warm-up filter tag across multiple emails, as this can increase the risk of being flagged by email providers. To maintain good deliverability, it's best practice to diversify your filter tags and email content as much as possible.

qa_candidates.question: How can I edit or cancel a message that is scheduled to be sent in the future in Unibox?
qa_candidates.answer: Currently, you can only cancel a scheduled send in Unibox; editing a scheduled message is not available yet. The ability to edit scheduled messages is planned for a future update.

qa_candidates.question: If I delete a lead, will it still be counted in my statistics and will it disappear from my inbox?
qa_candidates.answer: If you delete a lead, it will still be counted in your statistics and it will not disappear from your inbox.

qa_candidates.question: If I import a CSV file with a list of leads, in what order are the emails sent to them?
qa_candidates.answer: When you import a CSV file with a list of leads, the system will contact the leads in the order they appear in the original file, from top to bottom. If you want to control the sequence in which emails are sent, you can arrange the order of leads in your CSV before importing.

qa_candidates.question: Can I pass custom SMTP headers, such as to suppress the List-Unsubscribe header, through your system?
qa_candidates.answer: Unfortunately, our system does not currently support passing custom SMTP headers or injecting them into specific emails or accounts.

qa_candidates.question: Can your email sending software integrate with clay.com?
qa_candidates.answer: Our software does not have a direct integration with clay.com. However, you can achieve integration using alternative methods, such as following the steps outlined in this video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9KtD2Wrp2hU.

qa_candidates.question: Does updating a lead label using the 'Lead Variable Update or Add' endpoint trigger the 'Marked as XX' webhooks?
qa_candidates.answer: Yes, updating a lead label via the 'Lead Variable Update or Add' endpoint will now trigger the webhooks for 'Marked as XX' when the label is updated.

qa_candidates.question: What should I do if my emails are being blocked because the sending IP is blacklisted, but I'm using Google Workspace for email?
qa_candidates.answer: If your emails are being blocked due to the sending IP being blacklisted and you are using Google Workspace (Gmail) for email, the IP address in question belongs to Google's SMTP servers, not your email provider. In this case, you should contact your Google Workspace reseller or Google support directly, as only they can address issues related to Google's sending IPs being blacklisted.

qa_candidates.question: If I set up a subsequence to trigger when a lead is marked as interested, will it apply to leads who were marked as interested in the past, or only to new leads marked as interested going forward?
qa_candidates.answer: The subsequence will only trigger for leads who are marked as interested moving forward. If you want the subsequence to apply to leads who were marked as interested in the past, you can change their label to something else and then back to 'Interested' to trigger the subsequence.

qa_candidates.question: Why am I seeing a message that an app is blocked from accessing my Google Account, and how can I resolve this when connecting to Google Workspace?
qa_candidates.answer: This message appears because Google has blocked the app from accessing sensitive information in your Google Account for security reasons. Your Google account itself is not blocked. To resolve this, you need to allow the application in your Google Admin panel. Typically, an administrator must whitelist or grant access to the app by following the steps provided in your Google Admin console. If you need guidance, you can refer to instructional videos or documentation provided by the app or Google support.

qa_candidates.question: What services do lead generation agencies like Hypergen and Marlink provide?
qa_candidates.answer: Lead generation agencies such as Hypergen and Marlink are full-service providers that typically manage the entire outbound process for their clients. Their services often include developing outreach strategies, prospecting and building targeted lists, creating and running campaigns, writing copy, managing replies, and providing detailed reporting.

qa_candidates.question: Is there a way to bulk delete all contacts with empty email addresses from a list?
qa_candidates.answer: Currently, there is no built-in way to bulk delete all contacts with empty email addresses from a list. However, these contacts will be automatically skipped during enrichment and when importing to a campaign. If you need to remove them, you can export your list, filter out the empty email addresses in a spreadsheet, and then re-import the cleaned list.

qa_candidates.question: Does joining your affiliate program include a free business account?
qa_candidates.answer: Yes, joining our affiliate program includes a free business account, as long as you bring us 3 referrals each month.

qa_candidates.question: How long do affiliate cookies last, and what is required for affiliate commission to be attributed correctly?
qa_candidates.answer: Affiliate cookies last for 90 days. For commission to be properly attributed, users need to sign up using your unique affiliate link. In some cases, if users access pages without your link or if the cookie is lost, the commission may not be tracked correctly.

qa_candidates.question: Is it possible to remove the Pipl branding from Slack responses?
qa_candidates.answer: No, it is not currently possible to remove the Pipl branding from Slack responses. The team is considering white labeling the application in the future, but it is not a current priority.

qa_candidates.question: How can I find or copy the workspace ID from the user interface?
qa_candidates.answer: You can find and copy the workspace ID directly from the user interface by navigating to the Workspaces section. Inside the Workspaces area, the ID is displayed and can be copied as needed.

qa_candidates.question: Is it possible to resume sending emails in a campaign only to GSuite (Google Workspace) prospects, so that Outlook inboxes can be prioritized for a different campaign?
qa_candidates.answer: Yes, you can filter your lead list by email service provider (ESP), such as GSuite or Outlook. Once filtered, you can select the Outlook entries and move them to a different campaign. This allows you to resume sending emails only to GSuite prospects in your current campaign while prioritizing Outlook inboxes for another campaign.

qa_candidates.question: What should I do if I receive an 'IMAP Server AUTHENTICATE failed' error message when using Outlook?
qa_candidates.answer: If you receive an 'IMAP Server AUTHENTICATE failed' error message in Outlook, try reconnecting your email account. Look for the three-dot menu on the top right of your email account box, select it, and choose the 'Reconnect' option. This should prompt you to re-enter your credentials and re-establish the connection to your email provider. If the issue persists, double-check your username and password, and ensure your account settings are correct.

qa_candidates.question: How long does it take for a label to be auto-assigned after a reply is received via the universal on-reply webhook?
qa_candidates.answer: The label is typically auto-assigned in less than one minute after the first reply is received via the universal on-reply webhook.

qa_candidates.question: Is there a mobile app available for your platform, similar to what Smartlead and Instantly offer?
qa_candidates.answer: Currently, we do not have a mobile app for our platform. Our main focus is on core functionalities such as warmup quality and deliverability. Developing a mobile app is not a top priority at the moment.

qa_candidates.question: How can I access invoices if I am not the account owner?
qa_candidates.answer: Only the account owner can access invoices directly. There is currently no function to grant invoice access to other users. If you need access, you will need to ask the account owner to share their account access or provide the invoices to you.

qa_candidates.question: What should I do if I see a 'client side error' and a black screen when trying to delete leads from my campaign?
qa_candidates.answer: If you encounter a 'client side error' and a black screen when attempting to delete leads from your campaign, try clearing your browser cookies and refreshing the page. If the issue persists, you can also try using a different browser or opening the site in incognito/private mode. These steps often resolve client-side errors caused by cached data or browser extensions.

qa_candidates.question: How can I display dates in French in my emails using your tool?
qa_candidates.answer: You can display dates in French by adding 'fr' as the language parameter at the end of your date variable. For example, use {{pipl_date "now_wd 2Days" "dddd D" "fr"}} to get the date in French format. This works for all day variables—just add 'fr' at the end. Be sure to use the Test and Preview function to confirm the output.

qa_candidates.question: If I delete an email thread from my inbox, can I retrieve it or access it again? What happens if the client replies to the deleted thread?
qa_candidates.answer: Once you delete an email thread from your inbox, there is no way to retrieve or access it again. However, if the client replies to the deleted thread, their response will still appear in your inbox, allowing you to continue the conversation.
